channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Anthropic says ‘Claude will remain ad-free,’ unlike ChatGPT
item.description: Anthropic has announced that it won't be bringing ads to its AI chatbot Claude, in sharp contrast to confirmed plans from OpenAI to allow advertising in ChatGPT. To hammer the point home further, the company is releasing a Super Bowl commercial that makes fun of unnamed rivals adding adverts to their AI. "We want Claude […]

item.title: This 512GB Samsung P9 microSD Express card is on sale for 33 percent off
item.description: If you're looking to expand the storage on your Switch 2, the 512GB Samsung P9 microSD Express card is on sale right now for 33 percent off, marked down to $80 from $120. With component prices skyrocketing these days, it's getting increasingly rare to see good storage on sale, and 512GB for $80 is a much better deal than you'll currently find directly from Nintendo. The P9 boasts transfer speeds of up to 800MB/s, making moving games to the card that much faster. As for load times, in our testing we found that any microSD Express, the standard the Switch 2 requires, will offer roughly the same ...

item.title: Apple launches Xcode 26.3, brings even more AI power to coding on Mac
item.description: Apple ecosystem developers are now able to use agentic AI models from OpenAI and Anthropic within Xcode.

item.description: Gale Dekarios is also here to represent 'Baldur's Gate 3' in Wizards of the Coast's 'Dungeons & Dragons'-themed superdrop.

item.title: 9 Best Outdoor Security Cameras (2026): Battery-Powered, LTE, No Subscription
item.description: These weatherproof outdoor security cams keep a watchful eye on your property while you get on with life. Our list includes battery-powered and LTE cameras that need no subscription.

item.title: Accel doubles down on Fibr AI as agents turn static websites into one-to-one experiences
item.description: Fibr AI replaces marketing agency– and engineering-heavy website personalization with autonomous systems designed for enterprise scale.

item.title: Spotify upgrades its lyrics feature with offline access, more translations
item.description: Spotify is revamping its lyrics feature, adding offline access for Premium users, global lyric translations, and a more prominent placement in the Now Playing view.

item.title: Spotify is rolling out 3 exciting new features for Lyrics, including translations, and I can’t wait to finally understand what my favorite Spanish artists have been singing about
item.description: Spotify is finally launching Lyric Translations globally, and it's also giving it a new home in the mobile app.

item.title: A new Apple Pay scam is hitting millions – here's how to spot fake 'unusual activity' messages before it's too late
item.description: An Apple Pay scam uses urgency to panic Apple users into handing over their accounts.

item.title: Amazon retire déjà 20 % sur sa nouvelle sonnette 4K avec détection de mouvements 3D
item.description: Une image 4K, un système de détection 3D, une vision nocturne en couleur : une sonnette aussi complète demande un budget important, mais heureusement, la Ring Wired Video Doorbell Pro 3e génération, qui regroupe toutes ces fonctionnalités, perd 20 % de son prix.

item.title: Pfizer’s Experimental Weight Loss Drug Shows Promise as a Once-a-Month Shot
item.description: In Phase II data released this week, people taking a monthly dose of PF’3944 continued to lose more weight than those on a placebo.

item.title: Une anomalie sur une fusée SpaceX fait planer le doute sur le départ de Sophie Adenot

Une anomalie détectée il y a quelques jours sur la fusée Falcon 9 de SpaceX pourrait en effet entraîner un report du lancement de cette mission à destination de l’ISS, qui doit notamment...

item.title: Forget Hinge or Bumble. This App Promises a Personal AI Matchmaker
item.description: Instead of using AI as a coach, our AI chatbots just began talking to each other, as we became human facilitators for an AI love story. Now that's what I call dystopian.

item.title: Sen. Warren wants to know what Google Gemini’s built-in checkout means for user privacy
item.description: Sen. Elizabeth Warren (D-MA) is pressing Google for more information about its plans to build a checkout feature into its Gemini AI chatbot. In a letter to Google CEO Sundar Pichai, Warren expresses concerns that the integration could allow Google and retailers "to exploit sensitive user data" or "manipulate consumers into spending more and paying […]...

item.title: How to set up an AirTag
item.description: Apple’s AirTag makes it easy to keep tabs on everyday items like keys, bags and luggage using the Find My network. Setup is quick, requires no tools and takes just a minute or two as long as you have a compatible iPhone or iPad. Once paired, your AirTag quietly works in the background to help you locate misplaced belongings. This guide walks through how to set up an AirTag, how to name it so you can easily identify what it’s attached to and what to do if setup doesn’t go as planned.What you need before setting up an AirTagBefore you begin, make sure you have the following:An iPhone or iPad sig...

item.title: Huawei Watch GT 5 : la montre endurante des sportifs chute sous les 160 € (et des écouteurs sans fil sont offerts)
item.description: La Huawei Watch GT 5 reste une bonne montre de sport avec ses nombreux capteurs et son autonomie de deux semaines. Elle est encore plus intéressante quand elle est proposée par la marque à 152,99 euros au lieu de 269,99 euros, et livrée avec deux bracelets et des écouteurs sans fil Huawei FreeBuds SE 2 gratuits.

item.description: Take-Two CEO Strauss Zelnick has spoken about the potential of generative AI in the company's latest earnings call.

item.title: The Apple Watch SE 3 has dropped below $220 at Amazon — save $30 right now
item.description: As of Feb. 4, the Apple Watch SE 3 (GPS, 40mm) is on sale at Amazon for $219, saving you 12% off its usual price of $249.

item.title: Markiplier confirms Iron Lung movies theatrical run extended

item.title: AI agents are about to make access control obsolete
item.description: When AI reasons across systems, static permissions fail and intent becomes the real attack surface.

item.title: The smartphone era dip is over — 2025 compact camera shipments see a remarkable 29.6% rise, and a 49.8% growth in value
item.description: CIPA data for 2025 indicates a huge growth in the compact camera market, with a disproportionate rise in value, suggesting premium models lead the way.

item.title: Adobe reverses decision to discontinue Animate, apologizes for 'confusion and angst within the community'
item.description: Adobe says it will keep Animate in maintenance mode instead of fully discontinuing it, keeping important support and security updates.

item.title: Deux lancements de MacBook Pro cette année au lieu d’un ? Ce modèle très attendu arriverait dès l’hiver prochain
item.description: En plus des modèles M5 Pro & M5 Max attendus prochainement, Apple miserait bien sur le lancement d'un tout nouveau MacBook Pro OLED en fin d'année 2026. L'appareil profiterait notamment d'un nouveau châssis et d'une puce M6 gravée pour la première fois en 2 nm.

item.title: Microsoft et Google s’associent pour faciliter vos visioconférences
item.description: Les deux entreprises proposent une solution conjointe permettant aux utilisateurs disposant d’un matériel professionnel de visio de ne pas avoir à choisir entre Microsoft Teams et Google Meet.

item.title: Le moteur thermique sauvé par l’Europe ? Pourquoi les experts parlent déjà d’un désastre industriel
item.description: 2035 devait marquer la fin des ventes de voitures thermiques neuves en Europe. C'était sans compter sur la Commission européenne. Sous couvert de "flexibilité" industrielle, l'Europe s'apprête à laisser la porte ouverte au thermique. Des experts ont sorti la calculatrice, et le résultat est sans appel : c'est un désastre climatique et industriel qui se profile face à la Chine. ...

item.title: I’m a writer who won’t use generative AI — here are 7 AI-free tools that actually support real writing
item.description: Tired of AI writing tools that rewrite your voice? These 7 AI-free alternatives put writers back in control
